title: Mr. Kadir Topbaş | Department of Economic and Social Affairs

quotes: He worked as an architect for many years and became the Mayor of Beyoglu in 1999.
Topbas became a candidate for the Mayorship of Istanbul in 2004 Local Elections, and won with vast majority.
